channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish damped out side my shop, 8th December
item.description:
Someone keeps damping rubbish out side my shops and leaving by circles as well. It looks like stuff from a grocery shop

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Upper Clapton Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no.4, 8th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Square, Kentish Town, Greater London
